meanings.sent1: The permitter granted access to the building.
meanings.sent2: The permitter signed the document to allow the construction.
meanings.sent3: The permitter was like the gatekeeper of the city, deciding who could enter.
meanings.sent4: She was the permitter of dreams, allowing only the most worthy to come true.
meanings.sent5: The permitter's role was crucial in ensuring everything ran smoothly.

meanings.sent1: Please permitter me to enter the room.
meanings.sent2: The teacher will permitter the students to leave early today.
meanings.sent3: The cat permittered the mouse to roam freely in the house.
meanings.sent4: His kindness permittered her to pursue her passion for painting.
meanings.sent5: The judge permittered the defendant to speak in court.
